title: Start
body:
<<move Aig StageLeft2>><<move J-Pe StageRight2>>
<<outfit Aig Casual>>
<<expression Aig Neutral>>
<<outfit J-Pe Casual>>
<<expression J-Pe Neutral>>
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
Aig.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
Yeah?
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
I know Lee talked to you about this yesterday, but really, you have to get your shit together.
<<expression J-Pe Angry>>
Our debut concert is only three weeks away, and if you ruin this for m--US...I swear to god-
->I'll work harder
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<statUp Friendship J-Pe>>
    I'll work harder, I swear!
->Oopsy?
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    Uh...oopsy?
    <<name Friendship J-Pe>>
    <<statDown Friendship J-Pe>>
    Seriously? That's all you have to say?
    If this is you trying to brand yourself as "the cute one"...
    NEWSFLASH--you won't even get to debut if you don't get your head in the game.
->I do what I want.
    <<expression Aig Angry>>
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    I do what I want. I mean, I'm pretty sure I'm, like, the main character here, so...
    <<name Friendship J-Pe>>
    <<statDown Friendship J-Pe>>
    <<statDown Friendship J-Pe>>
    Are you even listening to yourself? Are you really going to let years of training end like this?
<<expression J-Pe Neutral>>
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
PLEASE, Aig. I really need you to work harder. I don't want to have to debut without you.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig Happy>>
Aw, that's actually kind of sweet--
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
<<expression J-Pe Angry>>
I mean, can you imagine? If I have to debut as a DUO with LEE? Name one successful duo.
<<flip J-Pe>>
GOD!
<<move J-Pe OffStageRight>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig Neutral>>
...or not.
